desc: The Clean Addicts specialise in dairy-free, eggless, vegan, gluten free and refined sugar free WHOLEFOOD cakes and mochi muffin. With baby-friendly, allergen-free and diabetic-friendly options. No artificial colourings or preservatives. Order online for delivery!

layout.text: OUR BESTSELLING WHOLEFOOD MOONCAKES ARE BACK!
Handmade from scratch with no nasties | Sold out in 2021!
PREORDER NOW WITH EARLY BIRD PROMO - LIMITED SLOTS!
